title: Three More Men Sentenced to Lengthy Prison Terms For Participation in Armed PCP Drug Distribution ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the District of Columbia ) WASHINGTON - Three men have been sentenced to lengthy prison terms for their roles in an armed narcotics organization that trafficked phencyclidine ( PCP ) in Southeast
